channel.title: Can someone give me a tutorial on 508? (MAD!)
channel.description: Can someone give me a good 508 client... Also a good server source.. Also how to connect... (IM GETTING MAD) Whenever i try connecting to a server it gets an error and cannot connect to server like no server run.bat is going on (which it is) and sometimes it will say try going to a dif world or something like that... I already got the cache stuff and put the client in there soooo if anyone would help thank you very much

item.title: Can someone give me a tutorial on 508? (MAD!)

item.description:
@5harp wrote:

umm tony is a good 508 coder but arnt you forgeting who the actual best 508 coder is…palidino76

also dude dont forget you have to run your source b4 you atempt to run your 508 or 503 client.

Read full topic
